next_steps.note: "Define 'Proactive Tasks': Create a brief definition of what constitutes a 'proactive task' within the context of this project. This establishes a shared understanding.",

"Brainstorming Session - Initial Ideas: Schedule a 30-minute brainstorming session with relevant stakeholders to generate an initial list of potential proactive tasks. Document all ideas, no matter how small.",
"Categorize Potential Tasks: Create 3-5 high-level categories for proactive tasks (e.g., 'Preventative Maintenance', 'Risk Mitigation', 'Customer Engagement', 'Process Improvement').",
"Prioritization Framework: Define criteria for prioritizing proactive tasks (e.g., impact, effort, cost, urgency).  This will be used to evaluate the brainstormed ideas.",
"Document Brainstorming Process: Create a simple document or spreadsheet to record the brainstorming session's results - ideas, categories, and initial prioritization scores."
